When \w the|strong="H2342"\w* \w report|strong="H8088"\w* cometh \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, they \w shall|strong="H4714"\w* be sorely \w pained|strong="H2342"\w* \w at|strong="H2342"\w* \w the|strong="H2342"\w* \w report|strong="H8088"\w* \w of|strong="H8088"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w your|strong="H3117"\w* \w joyous|strong="H5947"\w* \add city\add*, whose \w antiquity|strong="H6927"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w ancient|strong="H6924"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, whose \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w carried|strong="H2986"\w* \w her|strong="H2063"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w*?

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* said, Thou shalt \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H5937"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* thou \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Sidon|strong="H6721"\w*: \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w Kittim|strong="H3794"\w*; \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* shalt thou \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w the|strong="H7760"\w* land \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*: \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*; \w the|strong="H7760"\w* Assyrian \w founded|strong="H3245"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H6728"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* towers; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* overthrew \w the|strong="H7760"\w* palaces thereof; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w ruin|strong="H4654"\w*.

\w Howl|strong="H3213"\w*, ye ships \w of|strong="H4581"\w* \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w stronghold|strong="H4581"\w* \w is|strong="H7703"\w* laid \w waste|strong="H7703"\w*.
